alert.note: Alert for Malheur County; Oregon Lower Treasure Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 6:00PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Payette, northern Canyon, southwestern Gem and east central Malheur Counties through 800 PM MDT... At 659 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong outflow boundary that reported wind gusts of 44 mph at Ontario, moving southeast. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated and measured with ground observations. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Fruitland and New Plymouth around 700 PM MDT. Letha around 720 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Malheur County; Oregon Lower Treasure Valley
